alert.note: Alert for Bledsoe; Loudon; Rhea; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 7:41PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rhea, southwestern Loudon, northeastern Bledsoe, Meigs, northwestern McMinn and southwestern Roane Counties through 930 PM EST/830 PM CST/... At 841 PM EST/741 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles south of Crossville to 7 miles southwest of Spring City to 8 miles southwest of Dayton. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Athens, Dayton, Sweetwater, Decatur, Fairview, Spring City, Graysville, Niota, Paint Rock and Clear Water. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
